formulas.name: Base Pool – 6 dice (count 6s)
formulas.description: Year Zero base/skill dice. Adjust the number for your pool size.

formulas.name: Stress Pool – 3 dice (count 6s, track 1s)
formulas.description: Roll stress (or gear) dice separately to track 1s for panic/breakage.

formulas.name: Push Base Pool – reroll 2–5 once
formulas.description: Simulates a push: locks 1s/6s and rerolls 2–5 once, then counts 6s.

formulas.name: Push Stress Pool – reroll 2–5 once (track 1s)
formulas.description: Stress (or gear) push: locks 1s/6s, rerolls others once; counts 6s and tracks 1s.
